text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea oblongifolia is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is endemic to Sri Lanka.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea oblongifolia". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T30814A9579552. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T30814A9579552.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
